songs.title: Girl Band Medley
songs.lyrics:
[Who's Lovin' You: Perrie, Leigh-Anne, Jesy, and [Jade] (All)]
When I (when I)
Had you (had you)
I treated you (bad)
And wrong, my dear, but (since)
[Since you'd been] (away, yeah)
Don't ya know I (hang around)
Sit around (sit around)
With my head (with my head hanging down-)
And I wonder (wonder who's)
Loving  (you)
Hey

[No Scrubs: Jesy]
A scrub is a guy who think's he's fly
Also known as a buster (buster)
Always thinking bout what he wants
He just sits on his broken soul

[No Scrubs: All]
No I don't want your number
No, I don't wanna give you mine and no
I don't wanna meet you nowhere
No, I don't want none of your time
No, I don't want no scrub
A scrub is a guy that can't get no love from me
Hanging on the passenger side
Best friends try trying to holla at me
I don't want no scrub
A scrub is a guy that can't get no love from me
Hanging on the passenger side
Best friends try trying to holla at me

[No Scrubs: Leigh-Anne]
But a scrub is checkin' on me
But his game is kinda weak
And I know he ain't approach me
Cause I'm looking like class
And he's looking like trash
Can't get on with a dead beat ass

[No Scrubs: All]
So no, I don't want your number
No, I don't wanna give you mine and no
I don't wanna meet you nowhere
No, I don't want none of your time
No, I don't want no scrub
A scrub is a guy that can't get no love from me
Hanging on the passenger side
Best friends try trying to holla at me
I don't want no scrub
A scrub is a guy that can't get no love from me
Hanging on the passenger side
Best friends try trying to holla at me, me, me
Whoo!

[Leigh-Anne]
Okay, Wireless
We wanna see
Who's got the best booty shake

[Bootylicious: All]
Baby, can you handle this?
Baby, can you handle this?
Baby, can you handle this?
I don't think you can handle this!
Whoo!

[Bootylicious: Jesy]
Better move, we've arrived
Lookin' sexy, lookin' fly
Baddest chick, chick inside
DJ, jam tonight

[Bootylicious: Perrie]
Spotted me a tender thang
There you are, come on baby
Don't you wanna dance with me
Can you handle, handle me

[Bootylicious: Jade]
Gotta do much better
If you're gonna dance with me tonight
Gotta work your jelly
If your gonna dance with me tonight
Read my lips carefully if you like what you see
Move to the groove you can handle me
By the looks I got you shook up and scared of me
Hook up your seatbelt, it's time for takeoff

[Bootylicious: All]
I don't think you ready for this jelly
I don't think you ready for this jelly
I don't think you ready for this
Cause my body too bootylicious for ya babe
I don't think you ready for this jelly
I don't think you ready for this jelly
I don't think you ready for this
Cause my body too bootylicious for ya babe
Baby, can you handle this?
Baby, can you handle this?
Mixers, can you handle this?
I don't think you can handle this!
Whoo!

[Bootylicious: Jesy]
I'm about to break you off
H-town goin hard
Read my hips, slap my thighs
Swing my hair, square my eyes

[Bootylicious: Jade]
Lookin hot, smellin good
Groovin like I'm from the hood

[Bootylicious: Leigh-Anne]
Look over my shoulder, I blow you a kiss
Can you handle, handle this

[Bootylicious: All]
I don't think you ready for this jelly
I don't think you ready for this jelly
I don't think you ready for this
Cause my body too bootylicious for ya babe
I don't think you ready for this jelly
I don't think you ready for this jelly
I don't think you ready for this
Cause my body too bootylicious for ya babe
I don't think you ready for this jelly
I don't think you ready for this jelly
I don't think you ready for this

[Bootylicious: Leigh-Anne]
My body's too bootylicious
Woah ooh baby

[Bootylicious: All]
Hey

[Bootylicious: Perrie]
Woah, oh

[Jesy]
Uh, oh, ooh

[Don't Let Go: All]
What's it gonna be
Cause I can't pretend
Don't you wanna be more than friends
Hold me tight and don't let go, don't let go
Have the right to lose control, don't let go

[Don't Let Go: Perrie]
I often tell myself
That we could be more than just friends
I know you think that if we move too soon
It would all end

[Don't Let Go: Leigh-Anne]
I live in misery when you're not around
And I won't be satisfied 'til we're taking those vows

[Don't Let Go: All]
There'll be some lovemaking, heartbreaking, soul shaking
Oh, lovemaking, heartbreaking, soul shaking
What's it gonna be?
'Cause I can't pretend
Don't you wanna be more than friends?
Hold me tight and don't let go, don't let go
Have the right to lose control, don't let go

[Don't Let Go: Jesy]
Running in and out my life has got me so confused

[Don't Let Go: Perrie]
Together we can make it right

[Don't Let Go: All]
What's it gonna be?
'Cause I can't pretend
Don't you wanna be more than friends
Hold me tight and don't let go, don't let go
Have the right to lose control, don't let go
